data.prayer: Spirit, inspire Bible translators to communicate the Scriptures accurately in the heart languages spoken in Tacna, Peru.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Tacna, Peru
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Father, may the churches in Tacna, Peru honor local leaders who work hard for the flock of God.
data.verse: Pay careful attention to yourselves and to all the flock, in which the Holy Spirit has made you overseers, to care for the church of God, which he obtained with his own blood.

data.prayer: Father, help the 39,547 believers in Tacna to know that you can make a big impact through their simple obedience today.
data.verse: you will be for me a kingdom of priests

data.prayer: God in Heaven, only you can and should appoint evangelists. Please, appoint and send more to Tacna, Peru.
data.verse: And in the church God has appointed first of all apostles, second prophets, third teachers, then workers of miracles, and those with gifts of healing, helping, administration, and various tongues.

data.prayer: Spirit, I pray that the Asheninka, Pajonal people will come and worship before you, Lord. May they glorify your name for you are great.
Spirit, please give new believers a yearning to see you praised in Tacna, Peru.
data.verse: Declare his glory among the nations, his marvelous deeds among all peoples.

data.prayer: Lord, let it be said of the 234,953 lost in Tacna that you have called them out of darkness into your glorious light.
data.verse: But you are a chosen race, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a people for God’s own possession, that you may proclaim the excellence of him who called you out of darkness into his marvelous light

data.section_summary:
the state of Tacna, Peru has a population of 274,500.

We estimate Tacna has 39,547 people who might know Jesus, 218,649 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 16,304 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 6 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Jesus, protect the vulnerable in Tacna, Peru from the evil one.
data.verse: My prayer is not that you take them out of the world but that you protect them from the evil one.

location.name: Tacna
location.people_groups_list: Muinane Huitoto, Japanese, Amawaka, Pisabo, Matses
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Muinane Huitoto (600), Japanese (155,000), Amawaka (400), Pisabo (700), Matses (5,300)
